achievements.name: Hell dive
achievements.description: Complete a difficulty 10 or higher mission without a single death.

achievements.name: Making mountains out of molehills
achievements.description: Kill 100,000 enemies.

achievements.name: Peace and prosperity reigns again
achievements.description: Complete at least one planet in a successful Galactic Campaign.

achievements.name: Royal Roadkill
achievements.description: Kill a Bug or Illuminate assassination target by running it over with the APC or HAV.

achievements.name: A shining inspiration to us all!
achievements.description: Achieve the rank of Grand Lord (Rank 25).

achievements.name: The element of Supplies
achievements.description: Kill a Bug Tank with a Resupply Stratagem Hellpod.

achievements.name: Defender of Humanity
achievements.description: Take part in a successful defense of a capital city by completing at least one mission.

achievements.name: Now that is what I would call a multi-kill!
achievements.description: Kill 7 enemies within a very short time using only your primary weapon.

achievements.name: No man left behind
achievements.description: Extract from a difficulty 8 or higher mission with 4 players where all 4 get on the shuttle.

achievements.name: Never give up, never surrender
achievements.description: Use the Reinforce Stratagem while downed and the last Helldiver alive on a difficulty 8 or higher mission with 4 players.

achievements.name: Back in time for dinner
achievements.description: Complete a difficulty 4 or higher mission in 5 minutes or less.

achievements.name: A molehill of corpses
achievements.description: Kill 10,000 enemies.

achievements.name: Next time we meet, I'll probably have to salute you
achievements.description: Achieve the rank of Captain (Rank 13).

achievements.name: Spreading Managed Democracy
achievements.description: Take part in a successful final assault on an enemy's home planet by completing at least one mission.

achievements.name: Liberating the countryside
achievements.description: Complete all missions on a planet with difficulty 10 or higher.

achievements.name: Solid Stealth Execution
achievements.description: Complete a difficulty 7 or higher mission without triggering any alarms.

achievements.name: Don't you just hate escort missions?
achievements.description: Successfully complete an escort objective where all 4 NPCs survive.

achievements.name: They call me Mr. Danmaku
achievements.description: Complete a difficulty 7 or higher mission against the Cyborgs without taking damage from any enemy.

achievements.name: It's raining Hell, hallelujah!
achievements.description: Complete a mission using only Stratagems.

achievements.name: 80% of the time, I hit every time
achievements.description: Complete a mission with over 300 shots fired and 80% accuracy or better.

achievements.name: Brothers in Arms
achievements.description: Join another game through the matchmaking system.

achievements.name: Which seat can I take?
achievements.description: In a 4 player game, on a Friday, have all players sitting in an APC or HAV at the same time.

achievements.name: You're it until you die or I find someone better
achievements.description: Achieve the rank of Sergeant (Rank 7).

achievements.name: The Helldiver's new clothes
achievements.description: Customize your character.

achievements.name: Join the Army they said
achievements.description: Complete a mission.

achievements.name: Meet interesting people they said
achievements.description: Play at least once against all enemy races.

achievements.name: See the Galaxy they said
achievements.description: Play at least once on a desert, a forest, and a snow planet.

achievements.name: That which doesn't kill you, scars you for life
achievements.description: Finish the Training.

achievements.name: Dancing Queen
achievements.description: Do 25 capespins in a row, without moving, while on the ship bridge.

achievements.name: When the wrong tools do the job, are they still wrong?
achievements.description: Destroy a Bug Nest, Cyborg AA, or Illuminate Beacon with anything but the NUX-223 Hellbomb.

achievements.name: Why wasn't this standard issue?
achievements.description: Fully upgrade all non DLC Weapons and Stratagems.

achievements.name: Make Frank kill a Tank!
achievements.description: Kill a Bug Tank, Bug Behemoth, or Cyborg IFV by having the extraction shuttle land on it.

achievements.name: I'm no Zoologist, but how do you classify a 20 foot tentacle?
achievements.description: Face each new enemy once.

achievements.name: Stick it to the Man!
achievements.description: While in melee range from a Cyborg Warlord, use the "NO" communication command.

achievements.name: Nothing is hotter than a cup of Liber-Tea
achievements.description: Complete a volcanic type planet of difficulty 5 or more.

achievements.name: Knock-knock, who's there? DEMOCRACY!
achievements.description: Kill an Illuminate Obelisk while it is closed.

achievements.name: Add that one to the fossil record!
achievements.description: Defeat a Bug Hive Lord.

achievements.name: Resisting democracy is futile!
achievements.description: Defeat a Cyborg Siegemech.

achievements.name: It didn't SEE that coming!
achievements.description: Defeat an Illuminate Great Eye.
